TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k oʊ l s t ɛ l ɐ æ s k ɚ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ v iː z f ɪ ŋ z w uː ð h æ v f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t oʊ s ɪ k s s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v f ɪ k s l æ v z ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b i ɐ s n æ k oʊ v m eɪ b i ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɜː b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɔ b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t oɪ f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k iː t z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p v iː z s ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ə θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɜː w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ æ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
